alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 13 at 10:21AM CDT until July 13 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR NOXUBEE, LOWNDES AND SOUTHEASTERN OKTIBBEHA COUNTIES... At 1021 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Louisville and Ackerman. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Starkville, Columbus, Macon, Brooksville, Caledonia, Crawford, Shuqualak, Artesia, Deerbrook, Bent Oak, Bigbee Valley, Prairie Point, Sessums, Oktoc, Mashulaville, Paulette, Cooksville, Columbus AFB, Steens and Kolola Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
